tool_description:
REST APIs that provide latest Forex currency rate information that refreshes every 5 mins.
High availability, super low latency and easy dev-friendly response body structure. Must give it a try!
name: Xchange Currency
title: Xchange Currency

api_list.name: Current Foreign Currency Exchange Rate
api_list.description: Fetches the current foreign exchange rate that is refreshed every 15 mins.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xchange-currency.p.rapidapi.com/xchange/usd/gbp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xchange-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xchange-currency.p.rapidapi.com/xchange/{fromcurrency}/{tocurrency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xchange-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Currency Name
api_list.description: Get the Curreny Name / Label for the Currency Code
api_list.code:
